resources.string: Drag and drop the steps of algorithm in order.
The dataset is then split on the different attributes.
Choose attribute with the largest information as the decision node.
Calculate probabilities for each attribute, conditional on the class value.
Use the product rule to obtain a join conditional probability fr the attributes.
Use Bayes rule to derive conditional probabilities for the class variable.
Determine parameter K = number of nearest neighbors.
Calculate the distance between the query-instance and all training samples
Sort the distance and determin nearest neigbors based on the K-th minimun distance
Gather the category of the nearest neigbors.
Use simple majority of the category of nearest neigbors as the prediction value of the query instance.
